News.headline: Match Officials: Dagenham and Redbridge v Macclesfield Town

News.short_description: Saturday's referee for the Daggersâ€™ Vanarama National League home game against Macclesfield Town has been named as David Rock.
News.description:
The two assistants have been named as Callum Walchester and Thomas Hancock with the fourth official being Tim Donnellan.

Ticket information for the game can be found here.
